review: I got the Fire TV Stick for my fiance for Christmas. He LOVES it. It was  very easy to set up and get connected. Navigation is easy as well. The remote is small sleek, very easy to use. Netflix and Hulu work great. We haven't messed around with any of the other apps too much. One that we couldn't find was Vudu which was dissapointing. However I guess it makes sense, amazon wants you to rent movies from them, not a 3rd party. Overall we are very happy with the purchase.

review: Originally purchased this item due to the sale for Prime members. I have a Google Chromecast, so I am familiar with a lot of the casting features. The Fire TV Stick is awesome because it gives you an interactive interface.You DO NOT need to be a Prime member, but it is definitely recommended because it will show you the TV shows and movies that are available on Prime. In addition, you can download apps and games to play. Some games do not require the game controller, sold separately, but some do. Some apps and games are free, while others are not (just like regular app store). Parental controls are available to use and are recommended. You can display photos / videos from your Amazon cloud account. You can cast streams from your phone to your TV (eg, Netflix, YouTube, etc). You can also use screen mirroring, available on most phones/tablets with it. Setup is a breeze. Would recommend!
author: Prodigious
